title: riven keeps facerolling me or my toplaner

replies.body: Deny her kills. She's shitty at splitpushing. Picking a tanky champion who can harass her/wave clear is what has worked for me. Alternatively, Pick Darius or Irelia and straight up out duel her.

The way to beat riven is to abuse her cooldowns, they're pretty bad in the early levels.

TBH the only way to really get a feel for it is to play a bunch of riven games.
